com.imperio

Class ErrorHandlerExit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.imperio.ErrorHandlerPrint
      • com.imperio.ErrorHandlerExit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ErrorHandler

    public class ErrorHandlerExit
extends ErrorHandlerPrint
    This ErrorHandler behaves the same as ErrorHandlerPrint, except that after logging error messages, it terminates the program using the provided ErrorType.code.
    Since:
    1.0.0
